description: Main Features:The Toshiba 32" L1400U is the ideal slim LED TV for your living room or as an extra TV in the bedroom. With a modern design, curved corners and elegant stand, the 32" L400 is energy-efficient, featuring an LED-backlit display. When it comes to image quality, it delivers vibrancy and rich contrast everything you want from a TV. Equipped with Dynamic Picture Mode, it delivers maximum contrast, clarity and color saturation.
